mapper.select: SELECT id, sum_money AS sumMoney, used_money AS usedMoney, available_money AS availableMoney FROM WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ( sum_money, used_money, available_money, create_date, creator, create_ip ) VALUES ( #{sumMoney}, #{usedMoney}, #{availableMoney}, NOW(), #{creator}, #{createIp} )

INSERT INTO d_wallet_detail ( wallet_id, money_change, change_type, bef_sum_money, bef_used_money, bef_available_money, aft_sum_money, aft_used_money, aft_available_money, create_date, creator, create_ip ) VALUES ( #{walletId}, #{moneyChange}, #{changeType}, #{befSumMoney}, #{befUsedMoney}, #{befAvailableMoney}, #{aftSumMoney}, #{aftUsedMoney}, #{aftAvailableMoney}, NOW(), #{creator}, #{createIp} )
